name: The evolution of games
description:
Space score jam#24 submission.

I used "Evolve" in the narrative sense as the evolution of video gaming. You as the player get a look at different recreations from past games. Games include: Pong (1972), Snake (based on blockade 1976) and Missile Command (1980).

Simple controls:

WASD to move

Q, E or F to interact
